# CPMessageComposeBarButton

**Class**

A button that activates Siri and initiates the compose message flow.

## Declaration

```swift
class CPMessageComposeBarButton
```

## Overview



## Creating a Message Compose Bar Button

- **init()**: Creates a message compose button with a system-provided image.
- **init(image:)**: Creates a message compose button that displays a custom image.

## Providing Navigation Bar Buttons

- **backButton**: A button to display as the Back button on the navigation bar.
- **leadingNavigationBarButtons**: An array of bar buttons to display on the leading side of the navigation bar.
- **trailingNavigationBarButtons**: An array of bar buttons to display on the trailing side of the navigation bar.
- **CPBarButton**: A button for placement in a navigation bar.

## Inherits From

- CPBarButton

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
